content.rendered:
Directed by Ramesh Varma

Written by Ramesh Varma. Ramesh Varma. Srikanth Vissa. Sagar

Cast Ravi Teja (Mohan Gandhi). Arjun Sarja (Arjun Bharadwaj). Unni Mukundan (Rama Krishna). Meenakshi Chaudhary (Pooja). Dimple Hayathi (Aditi). Anasuya Bharadwaj (Chandini). Rao Ramesh (Raja Shekhar). Vennela Kishore (Bobby). Murali Sharma (Puttaparthi). Mukesh Rishi (Home Minister Guru Singham). Nikitin Dheer (Bala Singham). Thakur Anoop Singh (David). Sachin Khedekar (Jayaram). Vinodhini Vaidynathan (Rajasekhar’s Wife).Bharath Reddy.Keshav Deepak. Baby Sanvitha (Chinnu). Meenakshii Chaudhary (Pooja (as Meenakshi Chaudhary)). Nileshpatelxyz (Arjun)

Languages Telugu

Producers Ivano Fucci. Murali Krishna Kodali. Satyanarayana Koneru. Venkat Krishnamaneni

Production A Havish Production. A Studios. Pen Studios
